website_summaries.verdict: Colorful stickers with stars, smiley faces, and hearts that are appealing to youngsters as well as parents and teachers who want to give them as positive reinforcement.
pros: Brightly-colored stickers on rolls with perforated backings, which makes them easy to separate
Easy to peel or cut off individual stickers
A good choice for teachers who like to reward kids with stickers
cons: This collection contains 500 stickers, which is a lot, yet fewer than other sets we considered
Not as many designs as other sets, either

customer_reviews.title: Great rewards stickers...
customer_reviews.text: Liked the price. I did think from the pics that some were sparkly but they're not, just patterned. I use them as random recognition of behavior I'm a fan of. Low stick. Plusses and minuses: they do stick to clothes ONCE which is where I typically award them, but after that they fall off all over the house. It's probably for the best, as they can't damage stuff. DD doesn't seem to mind their lack of stickiness longevity.
customer_reviews.author: Kttn

customer_reviews.title: lots of colors and designs
customer_reviews.text: gifted these to my boss to hand out to patients and I give them away all the time. Patients request them everything they come back. Very colorful and love the different designs. Highly recommend them. Very cute
customer_reviews.author: Malaki

customer_reviews.title: Suoer cute
customer_reviews.text: Perfect stickiness! Sticky enough to make the kids happy but not enough to destroy everything
customer_reviews.author: theresa

customer_reviews.title: Mom’s will love these
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for her daughter’s behavior and room cleaning for her chart works wonders she loves it and has been good for Mom to
customer_reviews.author: Bethany Grant

customer_reviews.title: Great for teachers
customer_reviews.text: My kids love them, they are all really colorful and bright.
customer_reviews.author: Kat 🐈

customer_reviews.title: Reward for being a good gymnast
customer_reviews.text: The kids enjoy the stickers, and they put on listening ears, stay in line, and follow directions with a reward, and I prefer non-food rewards! Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Sheri L. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Fun stickers
customer_reviews.text: Stickers were perfect for my deployment chart count down for my kiddos.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: They don’t stick well.
customer_reviews.text: Most did not stick and not many stickers for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Madelyn Marie Liso

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful stickers
customer_reviews.text: These are good quality stickers that my students love. They adhere very well and the roll makes them fun and easy to tear off and take!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Rose

customer_reviews.title: Great for school
customer_reviews.text: The kids were asked to provide stickers for school. The teacher uses them as rewards for doing good. You get plenty in this pack, an all around good buy
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Great variety
customer_reviews.text: I used these as incentive stickers. The rolls are perforated so separation and handing them out is easy.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Good stickers
customer_reviews.text: My preschoolers love them. Not too tacky, but will stick nicely to shirts.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Brady

customer_reviews.title: Definitely by these stickers
customer_reviews.text: Nice stickers for reward. In this time of everyone homeschooling rewards are important. These are beautiful and fun.
customer_reviews.author: Sherrieberrie36

product_meta.title: Sticker Roll 5 Rolls of Party Supplies Stickers for Kids Teachers 500 Stickers
product_meta.description: This package contains 5 rolls of assorted exciting stickers (500 Stickers). Stickers are great for party favors, test papers, arts and crafts, carnivals, scrapbooks and so much more! Great gift for teacher.Reward your favorite child for their hard work with a stick from the Funky Star Roll of Stickers.
feature_bullets: 5 Sealed rolls of 100 Colorful Funky Stickers
Each roll has 100 stickers (approx 1.5" in size)
GREAT MOTIVATION: Adds a sense of motivation to students when placed on assignments and essays
Great fun stickers for positive reinforcement! Cheer up anyone with on of these fun stickers!
Stickers are easy to peal off and stick, great for children and adults!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars149 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
